item.description:
As discussed in the last email and at the meetup today, we're hosting a competitive flag football league. Its going to be a lot of fun.

I'm creating a meetup to make it easier for you guys to see who else is interested in playing. Hopefully, this will make it a lot easier to form a team or teams.

If you are interested in playing just post YES and someone will get in touch with you about the league. If you want to be the captain of a team, just post that in with the comments when you reply.

Some guys don't have cars, but don't worry b/c we can pair you up with a team that could help you get to the games. Also, I believe you can access the field via bus. Check http://www.hopstop.co... and as the destination use "watertown st. and aldrich rd." for Borough/City use "Watertown, MA".

The league starts July 19th, and registration has already begun.

Check http://baffl.blogspot... for more info about the league.

Also, please don't hesitate to email me any question you may have.

-Frank
item.name: MEN'S FLAG FOOTBALL LEAGUE INTEREST???
